programme.title: Blindspot
programme.desc: Season Final, Double Episode: An abandoned baby is found, and it has a tattoo matching one of Jane's, so the team try to identify the baby and save other infants in the process.

programme.title: Aquarius
programme.desc: S2 E10 At the expense of Charmain's career, Hodiak is determined to find the truth behind Bunchy's murder.

programme.title: Heavenly Creatures
programme.desc: Pauline and Juliet are two imaginative but seemingly normal teenagers. What sets them apart is that they murder Pauline's mother. Based on the true story, starring Kate Winslet and Melanie Lynskey.

programme.title: Goddess
programme.desc: A full-time mum of twins becomes a web sensation when she inadvertently broadcasts her sink songs across the internet. Starring Ronan Keating and Laura Michelle Kelly. (2013).

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: Debbie is offered a proposition; Lydia decorates Home Farm; Megan worries about Jai.

programme.title: Rural Delivery
programme.desc: Automation is the answer to sustainability for a pine seedling nurseryman. A dairy farmer takes a biological approach to his farm system. Then, geothermal energy grows plenty of flowers in Rotorua.

programme.title: Fishy Business
programme.desc: Fishy Business has great fishing action, top fishing tips and epic adventures.

programme.title: Sunday
programme.desc: The Sunday team go inside the case of six-year-old Coral Burrows, who was brutally murdered in Featherston in 2003. And, superstar Rebel Wilson reveals her relentless battle to clear her name.

programme.title: Tagata Pasifika
programme.desc: Tagata Pasifika is TVNZ's flagship Pacific news show, telling the stories of Pacific Islanders and its community.

programme.title: Praise Be
programme.desc: Chris Nichol presents a programme of hymns and worship songs for Easter Sunday.

programme.title: The Life And Times Of Temuera Morrison
programme.desc: Struggling with the fact that he's getting older, Tem embarks on publicity work for Mt Zion. However, he's buoyed by praise from co-star Stan Walker.

programme.title: Q+A
programme.desc: Join the Q+A team to find the answers to the questions that matter.

programme.title: Marae
programme.desc: Your window to the Māori world, telling stories through Māori eyes and keeping abreast of current events and issues impacting on Māori here and around the world.

programme.title: Waka Huia
programme.desc: Aroha Huaki loves teaching te reo Māori to urbanites. But it’s te reo Māori at home in rural Taihauāuru that needs a boost.

programme.title: Mucking In
programme.desc: Final: Jim Mora and the team head to Hamilton to surprise Colin and Barbara Smith during their weekly 'Waikato Rivertones' rehearsal.

programme.title: Fair Go
programme.desc: Pippa Wetzell, Hadyn Jones and the Fair Go team help New Zealanders who are battling bureaucracy, rip-offs or just simply fighting for their rights.

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: The Platts try to save David from himself. The return of a familiar face surprises Ken. The boys give Gary some advice.

programme.title: Fishing Leopards
programme.desc: The intimate story of a leopard mother and her two cubs. This very special family must survive in the wilds of Botswana alongside some less-than-friendly neighbours: lions, wild dogs and hyenas.

programme.title: Purina Pound Pups To Dog Stars
programme.desc: A deep chain neck wound nearly killed her, but Staffy Cross Jewel is being set up to find an amazing new life with trainers Mark and Jaz. Can her smarts live up to the task and win her a family?

programme.desc: Queen of Comedy, Miranda Hart, hosts this year's Royal Variety Performance. Taking the stage are, The Killers, Seal, Louis Tomlinson, The Script, Paloma Faith and many more.

programme.desc: In this special, Sir Elton John talks to friend and fan David Walliams about an extraordinary career - and his songwriting partnership with lyricist Bernie Taupin - spanning 50 years.

programme.title: Flea Market Flip
